mapper.select: select * from tb_user order by user_no desc
select b.bil_id, b.order_date, b.user_id, i.item_nm, b.order_state from tb_bil b, tb_cart c, tb_item i where b.bil_id = c.bil_id and c.item_id = i.item_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_item (item_id, item_nm, price, stock, item_img, de_fee, con_img) values (tb_item_seq.nextval, #{item_nm}, #{price}, #{stock}, null, null, #{con_img})
